result.longName: Guangzhou Metro Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Guangzhou Metro Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd. provides engineering consultancy services. The company provides professional technical services, including survey and design, planning consultation, and general contracting for rail transit, municipal, construction, and other construction projects. In addition, it offers measurement services; standardization services; planning and design management; engineering management services; environmental protection monitoring; basic geological exploration; quality survey technical services; professional design services; fire-fighting technical services; safety assessment services; surveying and mapping services; geological hazard risk assessment; safety production inspection and testing; construction engineering quality inspection; cultural relics protection engineering survey; geological disaster control engineering survey; construction engineering survey; special equipment design; cultural relics protection engineering design; building intelligent system design; construction engineering design; general contracting of housing construction; and municipal infrastructure projects. The company is based in Guangzhou, China. Guangzhou Metro Design & Research Institute Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangzhou Metro Group Co., Ltd.
